metadata.description: Data Hub Subscription Name e.g. s101d01. Used as a prefix for created resources
Data Hub Environment Name e.g. ees. Used as a prefix for created resources
The number of SignalR units.
Firewall restrictions for the admin application
Firewall restrictions for storage accounts, string array
The username of the content api for the public SQL Server
The password of the content api user of the public SQL Server
The username of the data api for the public SQL Server
The password of the data api user of the public SQL Server
The username of the content api for the private SQL Server
The password of the content api user for the private SQL Server
The username of the data api for the private SQL Server
The password of the data api user for the private SQL Server
The username of the publisher for the private SQL Server
The password of the publisher user for the private SQL Server
The username of the publisher for the private SQL Server
The password of the importer user for the private SQL Server
The username of the admin app for the private SQL Server
The password of the admin app for the private SQL Server
Firewall restrictions for sql databases
The admin user of the SQL Server
The password of the admin user of the SQL Server
Number of days to retain the security alerts for
Enables Basic Auth on the public application, the purpose of this is prevent accidential access to the application before it is publically avaliable (following GDS guidance)
Username protecting the public app, no requirement to be secret, the purpose of this is prevent accidential access to the application before it is publically avaliable (following GDS guidance)
Password protecting the public app, no requirement to be secret, the purpose of this is prevent accidential access to the application before it is publically avaliable (following GDS guidance)
Google Analytics tracking ID for the public app. Leave as empty string to disable Google Analytics
Gov UK Notify service template Id for verifing subscription
Gov UK Notify service template Id for new release notification
Gov UK Notify service template Id for amended release notification
Gov UK Notify service template Id for subscription confirmation
Gov UK Notify service template Id for new user invites
Gov UK Notify service template ID for approver notifications
Enables the Functions in the Publisher App which allow scheduled Releases to be published immediately
Email addresses for receiving alerts
Tag Value - Enter the Department name tag value e.g. Data Directorate
Tag Value - The name of the phase of the development lifecycle environment that the component will be used in e.g. Development / Test / Integration / Production
Tag Value - Enter the full name of the Azure subscription where this resource is located e.g. s101-datahub-development / s101-datahub-test / s101-datahub-production
Tag Value - Enter the solution name that the component is a part of e.g. EDAP, LDS, EES
Tag Value - Enter the cost centre identifying value provided by the Service Owner. Otherwise populate with Unknown.
Tag Value - Enter the name of the Service or Application Owner in the SURNAME, Firstname format e.g. SINCLAIR, Paul / SHELBY, Laura

Tag Value - Enter the date that the component was created using the YYYYMMDD format e.g. 20190417. Use of the utcNow function will automatically populate this entry at creation time. Note: This only works when forced as a default value.
Tag Value - Enter the name of the user who created these resources in the SURNAME, Firstname format e.g. RULER, Paul
Tag Value - Enter the name of the repo that the deployment script for the component name be found. If the component is deployed manually, the value should be N/A
Tag Value - Enter the name of the main script (not the parameters file) used to deploy the component. If the component is deployed manually, the value should be N/A
Cron string that is used to control the schedule of the Publish Releases Function in the Publisher App
Cron string that is used to control the schedule of the Publish Release Content Function in the Publisher App
Prerelease start time as number of minutes before a release is scheduled to be published
Prerelease end time as number of minutes before a release is scheduled to be published
Retain blobs after delete
Number of days to retain blobs after delete
Whether or not this environment's Admin API supports refresh tokens
Whether or not this environment's Admin API supports reusable or one-time refresh tokens
Whether or not this environment's Admin API has refresh tokens expiring at a fixed date or in a within a sliding window that extends with each use of a refresh token
Whether or not short-lived in-memory caching of specific responses is enabled
Max size of in-memory cache in MBs.  This is an approximation based on the size of the cached objects in JSON notation.
The frequency of scans to evict expired entries from the in-memory cache.
Override duration in seconds for all entities cached in memory
Override cron expression for all entities cached in memory
Timeout in milliseconds for a table builder query to return results before cancelling the request in the API
Maximum number of table cells that a table builder query could potentially render for a request to be valid
Slack webhook URI for alerts

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'ImporterAppServiceHttpServiceErrors')]
metricAlerts.description: Importer App Service - Http Service Errors

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'NotificationsAppServiceHttpServiceErrors')]
metricAlerts.description: Notifications App Service - Http Service Errors

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'PublisherAppServiceHttpServiceErrors')]
metricAlerts.description: Publisher App Service - Http Service Errors

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'StatisticsReplicaDBDataIOPercent')]
metricAlerts.description: Statistics Replica DB Data IO Percentage

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'StatisticsReplicaDBDataSpaceUsedPercent')]
metricAlerts.description: Statistics Replica DB Data Space Used Percentage

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'StatisticsReplicaDBDataSpaceUsedPercentUrgent')]
metricAlerts.description: Statistics Replica DB Data Space Used Percentage - URGENT

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'StatisticsReplicaDBBlockedByFirewall')]
metricAlerts.description: Statistics Replica DB Blocked By Firewall

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'StatsDBDataSpaceUsedPercent')]
metricAlerts.description: Statistics DB Data Space Used Percentage

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'StatsDBDataSpaceUsedPercentUrgent')]
metricAlerts.description: Statistics DB Data Space Used Percentage - URGENT

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'ContentDBDataSpaceUsedPercent')]
metricAlerts.description: Content DB Data Space Used Percentage

metricAlerts.name: [concat(parameters('subscription'),'ContentDBDataSpaceUsedPercentUrgent')]
metricAlerts.description: Content DB Data Space Used Percentage - URGENT

connectionStrings.name: StatisticsDb
connectionStrings.connectionString: [concat('Data Source=tcp:', reference(concat('Microsoft.Sql/servers/', variables('publicSqlServerName'))).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ',1433;Initial Catalog=', variables('statisticsReplicaDbName'), ';User Id=', parameters('sqlPublicDataApiUser'), '@', reference(concat('Microsoft.Sql/servers/', variables('publicSqlServerName'))).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ';Password=', parameters('sqlPublicDataApiPassword'), ';')]

connectionStrings.name: ContentDb
connectionStrings.connectionString: [concat('Data Source=tcp:', reference(concat('Microsoft.Sql/servers/', variables('coreSqlServerName'))).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ',1433;Initial Catalog=', variables('contentDbName'), ';User Id=', parameters('sqlDataApiUser'), '@', reference(concat('Microsoft.Sql/servers/', variables('coreSqlServerName'))).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ';Password=', parameters('sqlDataApiPassword'), ';')]

resources.name: [concat(variables('dataAppName'), '/', parameters('deploySlotName'))]
resources.comments: This specifies the web app slots.
